---
name: partnership-development
description: Use when identifying growth partnership opportunities and structuring co-marketing or integration deals. Trigger when needing to define a value exchange between complementary companies, setting up affiliate commission structures, or launching joint webinars and content to share audiences.
license: MIT
---

# Partnership Development

## Quick Start

This skill helps you build growth partnerships. For complete frameworks, see the [Complete Guide](references/guide.md).

## Execution Checklist

### Building Partnership

- [ ] Identify complementary companies
- [ ] Define value exchange (what each gets)
- [ ] Reach out to decision makers
- [ ] Pitch partnership opportunity
- [ ] Structure deal (rev share, affiliate, co-marketing)
- [ ] Document agreement
- [ ] Launch partnership
- [ ] Track metrics and optimize

## Partnership Types

- **Integration**: Technical product integration
- **Co-Marketing**: Joint webinars, content, events
- **Affiliate**: Commission on referrals
- **Reseller**: Partner sells your product
- **Strategic**: Long-term, deep collaboration

## Quick Wins

- Start with complementary tools (same audience)
- Integration partnerships (appear in their marketplace)
- Co-marketing webinars (audience sharing)
- Affiliate program (low risk for partners)

## Resources

- [Complete Guide](references/guide.md)
